name: Project Starship X demo
description:
"Project Starship X" is a procedural bullet hell, sequel of "Project Starship" (yeah, just an extra X at the end ).

The formula of the previuos title is improved, and the player can now use the "X Maneuver": a powerfull move that let's you dodge bullets and clash into enemies!

This is a Demo of an early Alpha. Excpect bugs and unfair patterns.

Please leave a feedback!

Controls:

Z - Shoot

X- Dodge

Space - Bomb

Shift - Slow Down
